name: Funland (RedWare)
description:
Funland is a short game where you are a Square, in this game you have to defeat the grand  King Circle, who has conquisted funland and wants to destroy the Squares to make his own World Of Circles.

The Game currently does not have a final boss battle. you can only reach the king circle castle, once you reach it, consider you completed the game, a Final Boss Will be added in the Future

We also have a Beta Battle Mode, It will be added Later

To play the GB Version of the game, you can use a Flash Cart (such as EzFlash Jr.) to run it in a Real GB, put the SD card in your PC, then put the .gb File on the root of the SD Card, return the SD Card to the Flash Cart. then Enjoy Funland!

To play the 3DS Version of the game, you need a Hacked 3DS with CFW and SD Card, put the .cia in the Root of your SD, then put the SD in the 3DS. use FBI to install the VC Port
